item.title: Mediashelf
item.description: Last edited: March 31, 2024 My favorite books, podcasts, and other media sources. Books (Unordered and incomplete) Sci-fi Neuromancer by William Gibson Dune I && II by Frank Herbert Dark Matter by Blake Crouch Hyperion by Dan Simmons Bloodchild by Octavia E. Butler Project Hail Mary by Andy Weir Non-fiction Digital Minimalism by Cal Newport Permanent Record by Edward Snowden The Innovators by Walter Isaacson Life 3.0 by Max Tegmark Fiction
